00015 IDs::source& IDs::source::operator=(const std::string& rhs){
00016     // Find the first delimiter
00017     size_t delim=rhs.find(IDs::field_separator.c_str());
00018     if(delim==std::string::npos){
00019         std::cout<<"Warning: Strange looking string given to IDs::source: "<<rhs<<std::endl;
00020         Channel()=rhs;
00021     } else{
00022         Channel()=rhs.substr(0,delim);
00023         Generator()=rhs.substr(delim+1);
00024     }
00025     return *this;
00026 }
